SEARCH
Module ing.sw
Package IS24_LB11.cli

Class CommandLine

java.lang.Object
IS24_LB11.cli.CommandLine
public class CommandLine extends Object
The CommandLine class represents a command line interface for user input. It manages the input line, cursor position, and rendering the command line view.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Description
    CommandLine(CommandLineView view)
    Constructs a CommandLine object with a given view.
